name: Ben
aboutMeHeadline: Ben Workshop is a specialty manufacturer of licensed and proprietary collectible products
aboueMeDetails:
Ben Workshop holds various licenses for a variety of top-rated pop culture icons, including characters from Power Rangers, Wukong, etc ... 
Ben Studio is a visual effects company which we manufacture and sale high quality figures of movies and games characters.

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.description:
Android app development via Flutter
- Splash Screen
- Firebase Auth/Cloud
- REST APIs
- Maps integration and more...!

projects.title: Awesome SnackBar
projects.description: A dart package including a wholesome experience of snackbar in your applications.
